message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"to stand up; to be standing","sentence":"他们站在车上。","image_prompt":"Animated scene of three people standing inside a brightly lit bus, all upright and holding handrails as the vehicle moves. The city can be seen outside the windows with soft, glowing lights. The overall style should evoke a soft, dreamy apocalypse with gentle hues, conveying a peaceful yet surreal atmosphere. Emphasize the action of standing, with the bus interior clearly depicted.","sentence_translation":"They stand on the bus."}
